ISSUE.TITLE: Deploy preview docker image for Windows setp in the "Preview - CI" is failing
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Strange error in the CI. It's failing. I am wondering if it is pulling from cache for some reason. The same step works on Ubuntu. https://github.com/OrchardCMS/OrchardCore/actions/runs/6881515041/job/18718018240#step:13:230 ``` Sending build context to Docker daemon 580.4MB Step 1/6 : FROM mcr.microsoft.com/dotnet/aspnet:8.0 8.0: Pulling from dotnet/aspnet no matching manifest for windows/amd64 10.0.20348 in the manifest list entries Login Succeeded An image does not exist locally with the tag: ***/orchardcore-cms-windows The push refers to repository [docker.io/***/orchardcore-cms-windows] Error: Process completed with exit code 1. ``` @sebastienros @jtkech any idea why this step is failing?
